name: A structured representation of individuals' life histories, detailing personal information, educational and career trajectories, significant life events, relationships, and affiliations, each contextualized with temporal and spatial attributes to provide a comprehensive overview of a person's life journey.

classes.name: Entity
classes.description: A generic top-level class acting as the absolute root for the ontology hierarchy.

classes.name: Thing
classes.description: The most general class representing any entity in the ontology, serving as the root class for all other classes.

classes.name: Person
classes.description: An individual human being with a distinct identity.

classes.name: LifeEvent
classes.description: An occurrence with significance in a person's life, such as marriage, childbirth, adoption, health crises, migration, or retirement.

classes.name: Location
classes.description: A geographic place relevant to a person's life events or statuses.

classes.name: FamilyRelationship
classes.description: A specific type of relationship between persons indicating familial connections including parent, child, sibling, spouse, adoptive, step, extended, and chosen family.

classes.name: MigrationPathway
classes.description: A sequence of geographic locations representing the movements of a person over time.

classes.name: Status
classes.description: A condition or state experienced or held by a person at a given time, often overlapping with life events.

classes.name: Timeline
classes.description: A conceptual sequence that represents events or statuses in chronological order including ages and corresponding locations.

classes.name: Residence
classes.description: A location where a person has lived or currently lives.

classes.name: Workplace
classes.description: A location where a person works or has worked.

classes.name: School
classes.description: An educational institution or location attended by a person during their life.

classes.name: TimelineEntry
classes.description: An entry in a Timeline representing a specific event or status with time, age, and location information.

classes.name: Uncertainty
classes.description: A conceptual class representing unknown, incomplete, or non-traditional information in a person's life history, including missing or disrupted data.

classes.name: SocialRelationship
classes.description: A type of connection between persons that includes social, chosen, or non-familial relationships beyond biological, adoptive, or step-family ties.

classes.name: TemporalOverlap
classes.description: Represents an overlapping or concurrent temporal relationship between two TimelineEntries or LifeEvents in a person's timeline.

classes.name: FamilialRelationship
classes.description: A subclass of FamilyRelationship specifying different types of biological or legal familial connections including parent, child, sibling, spouse, adoptive, and step family.

classes.name: ChosenRelationship
classes.description: A subclass of SocialRelationship representing relationships chosen or selected by individuals such as close friends or community members recognized as family.

object_properties.name: hasLifeEvent
object_properties.description: Relates a Person to significant LifeEvents experienced by them.

object_properties.name: occurredAtLocation
object_properties.description: Relates a LifeEvent to the Location where it took place.

object_properties.name: hasFamilyRelationship
object_properties.description: Relates a Person to another Person describing their familial relationship type.

object_properties.name: hasMigrationPathway
object_properties.description: Relates a Person to their MigrationPathway representing their geographic movements over time.

object_properties.name: includesLocation
object_properties.description: Relates a MigrationPathway to the Locations that form part of the movement sequence.

object_properties.name: hasStatus
object_properties.description: Relates a Person to a Status they hold or have held.

object_properties.name: hasLocation
object_properties.description: Relates a Status or LifeEvent to its associated Location.

object_properties.name: hasTimeline
object_properties.description: Relates a Person to their Timeline of events and statuses including ages and locations.

object_properties.name: hasTimelineEntry
object_properties.description: Relates a Timeline to its constituent TimelineEntries describing events or statuses sequentially.

object_properties.name: representsLifeEvent
object_properties.description: Relates a TimelineEntry to the LifeEvent it represents.

object_properties.name: representsStatus
object_properties.description: Relates a TimelineEntry to the Status it represents.

object_properties.name: hasUncertainty
object_properties.description: Relates instances of LifeEvent, Status, or TimelineEntry to Uncertainty representing incomplete or disrupted information about that event, status, or timeline entry.

object_properties.name: hasSocialRelationship
object_properties.description: Relates a Person to another Person describing their social or chosen relationships not covered by formal FamilyRelationship.

object_properties.name: hasTemporalOverlapWith
object_properties.description: Relates a TimelineEntry or LifeEvent to another TimelineEntry or LifeEvent that overlaps or is concurrent in time, modeling simultaneous or overlapping periods.

object_properties.name: hasTemporalOrderAfter
object_properties.description: Relates a TimelineEntry or LifeEvent to another TimelineEntry or LifeEvent that occurs immediately after it in temporal sequence, defining temporal ordering of life events or statuses.

data_properties.name: occurredOnDate
data_properties.description: Specifies the date when a LifeEvent occurred.

data_properties.name: hasAgeAtEvent
data_properties.description: Specifies the age of a Person at the time of a TimelineEntry event or status.

data_properties.name: hasDocumentationStatus
data_properties.description: Specifies the degree or quality of documentation available for data about a LifeEvent, Status, or TimelineEntry, e.g., complete, partial, uncertain.
